name: Daniel Hilpoltsteiner
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: JavaScript / TypeScript Developer for several years. Started with AngularJS, followed by React and now back to Angular Development as Frontend Frameworks. Working with Express and NestJS in the Backend
what_can_i_contribute: Last Time JS Craftcamp happend Robert shared two sessions with me on Gatsby and NestJS. Maybe something related in this context. But I am also very experienced in asking dumb questions and/or making others laugh.
